website_summaries.verdict: This supplement is designed to boost joint health and promote brain and heart health with a blend of fish-based omega-3 fatty acids and organic flaxseed oil.
pros: To aid in digestion and prevent fishy burps, it is formulated with lemon, parsley, and rosemary
Several users report improved cholesterol numbers after using this supplement as well as healthier hair and nails
cons: Some people have problems taking the larger sized pills
Select users report unpleasant GI side effects

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Love how high the DHA/EPA content is for just one pill! They're large like all omega 3 supplements, but with other brands you need to take 3 or more during the day. They're crystal clear and have minimal fillers. I always repurchase these!
customer_reviews.author: k.

customer_reviews.title: go down easy and no burps
customer_reviews.text: Hope my accidental review is retreated..I gave bad review on size and taste...my mistake..wasn't clear on review age. Thought I was reviewing the large multis for women. .I find nothing wrong with these capsules.
customer_reviews.author: i asimov

customer_reviews.title: my younger sister who is a nutritionist recommended this brand of vitamins for me
customer_reviews.text: my younger sister who is a nutritionist recommended this brand of vitamins for me. I really liked this omega supplement. No fishy after taste or fish burb - BIG PLUS and easy to swallow. Delivered pretty quick and will definitely be ordering more once i run out
customer_reviews.author: Sanaz ziad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - helps with inflammation after a sports injury - better than taking OTC pain meds
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P.

customer_reviews.title: I keep this in a cool dry place
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who says their fish oil pill is odorless is a liar. I keep this in a cool dry place. Initially odorless but now they're pretty stinky when I open the container. As for the product, I have no idea if I get any health benefits from it. My diet isn't very balanced so I take it as a "Why not"
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real Rainbowlight Product!!! The packaging was super weird, then opening the bottle it smelled like something died inside. I looked for these on the actual Rainbowlight website... guess what, they don't exist. Also, its NOT RETURNABLE, so now I am out a bunch of money. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Stetson Osusky

customer_reviews.title: great difficulty getting down
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to swallow. The capsule immediately becomes sticky and sticks to my throat, great difficulty getting down. Pretty scarey. I take other capsules with no problem. Therefore, it sits unused. Maybe some day I could try emptying a capsule into a slushy ?
customer_reviews.author: JS - CA

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Light Omega Fish
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product since I really like the Rainbow Multi Vitamins. Like some of the other reviewers, I do experience a little lemony burp afterwards but nothing bad. Wish there was a way to gauge the actual benefit the body is experiencing compared to other brands, types, etc.. I often wonder is one fish oil better than the other...
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Food-based Vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins, especially because they're food-based. I can tell a big difference in my hair/nail growth when I'm taking them. I can also tell that my hair is more healthy and more shiny. I was also told by my esthetician to start taking a fish oil pill for healthy skin and this brand was recommended. I am a very content customer and will continue to order Rainbow Light.
customer_reviews.author: katedylan

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy that they are bio-available and well sourced
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Rainbow Light vitamins. I enjoy that they are bio-available and well sourced. These are no different. They don't leave a fishy aftertaste and all you need is one pill a day to get your recommended dosage.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyOxymoron

customer_reviews.title: MD who eats a plant-based diet approves
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper ways to get a combo pill (vitacost, for example), but these taste great. I eat a plant-based diet but I'm also a physician and feel that fish oil is a healthy component of a balanced diet. I have no desire to eat fish and could not stomach a pill that tasted like fish. I taste NO fish at any point during or after these pills. They taste almost sweet as I take them. I take one a day.
customer_reviews.author: GroundhogMom

customer_reviews.title: Has fish taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product. I bought because it claimed no fish taste or smell, but it does have both a fish taste and smell. I would not have spent money on this if I had known.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: I just found this brand and really like their attention to quality
customer_reviews.text: I just found this brand and really like their attention to quality. I already use fish oil in combination with Flax oil so this product is perfect to combine the two best fatty acids you can add to your diet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love that there is no after-taste when taking these. I have had to discontinue taking some omega supplements because I can't handle the fishy taste coming back up a while after taking. Many of those supplements even said "no fishy after-taste." Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, It's more reasonable ordered through Amazon. The pills are easy to swallow and you don't burp up the fish taste,course I drink lots of water! The package has an easy to read label of ingredients. this Seller mailed this item in record time!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowersdc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love these. I still get burps but they taste like lemon instead of fish

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that you only need one dosage of these a day compared to two or more with other brands. I normally do not get the fishy burps but on occasion I do. That is why I gave it 4 stars. Great brand and I will keep these in my daily rotation.

customer_reviews.title: Like it.

customer_reviews.title: Really sad.

customer_reviews.author: Kristi Bee

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to start taking an Omega supplement, and I was thrilled that this one also had Flax oil. It is supposed to be formulated for easy digestion, and even many of the reviewers said they had little or none of the burping common to fish oil pills. However, I took my first one on a full stomach after dinner, and for the rest of the night--and into the next day--I had unpleasant, frequent belching, as well as a stomach ache and general feelings of indigestion. I didn't want to try again. I don't know why I had such a bad reaction, but apparently this formulation is not for everyone. I will have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jubercat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I actually feel better after taking these. Less pain in my legs!

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Just 3 years ago these were sold out of the Rainbow Light Amazon store for $14. The same count is now $46 and often fulfilled by a third-party retailer. Very interesting what's going on with the pricing. Wondering if Rainbow Light stopped manufacturing this product and third-party retailers are selling old stock at exorbitant prices.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fish Oil Product

Their Vitamin D has given me proven blood level results, which I take very seriously when selecting vitamins. This fish oil product smells and tastes much better than other fish oil products I've tried in the past. While I can't tell a difference in my overall health, I know that fish oil is good for the heart.

I usually can't take vitamins on an empty stomach but because these vitamins are food/plant based they are so easily digested and the formulation is great for max absorption.

product_meta.title: Rainbow Light - Everyone's Omega Fish & Flax, Supports a Healthy Brain and Heart while Promoting Joint Comfort with Omega-3 EPA and DHA, Organic Flax Oil and Vitamin D3, Lemon Flavored, 60 Softgels
product_meta.description: Potent Protection for Heart, Brain, and Joint Health. Consumption of omega-3 fatty acids has been found to support healthy blood pressure and triglyceride levels, as well as promote overall heart health. That's why the American Heart Association recommends eating at least two servings of fish per week. Each daily dose of Everyone's Omega Fish & Flax delivers 502 mg total of omega-3s-the equivalent of two servings of fish-including 200 mg of EPA and 175 mg of DHA, two of the most crucial omega-3s. Everyone's Omega Fish & Flax only contains small fish species that have been caught in clean water, free of environmental pollutants. For increased absorption and easy digestion of the fish, the formula includes a blend of lemon, parsley, rosemary and triglyceride fish oils. You won't experience any fishy aftertaste or "fishy burps" with Everyone's Omega Fish & Flax.
feature_bullets: FOOD BASED FORMULA: For increased absorption and easy digestion of the fish, the formula includes a blend of lemon, parsley, rosemary and triglyceride fish oils
POTENT PROTECTION: Omega-3 fatty acids to supports your heart, brain, bones, joints, skin, and vision health
NO FISHY TASTE: You won't experience any fishy aftertaste or "fishy burps" with Everyone's Omega Fish & Flax
SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: 100% Post-Consumer recycled and recyclable bottles that are BPA-free, we take a stand for more ocean, less plastic
PURITY SAFEGUARD: Gluten and Soy Free made with natural, purity tested ingredients and NO artificial preservatives, colors, flavors or sweeteners
